channel.title: CVE Feed for https://github.com/vvo -- all

item.title: CVE-2018-3772|2024-09-17T02:26:55.080Z -- https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fvvo -- whereis
item.description: Concatenating unsanitized user input in the `whereis` npm module < 0.4.1 allowed an attacker to execute arbitrary commands. The `whereis` module is deprecated and it is recommended to use the `which` npm module instead.
